dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6339 IH: States Choose Common Sense Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Green of Tennessee introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To prohibit withholding or revoking Federal funds based on the definition of sex used by a State, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the States Choose Common Sense Act of 2023.

section.header: Prohibition on withholding or revoking Federal funds based on the definition of sex used by a State

subsection.text: No Federal funds authorized to be made available to a State may be withheld or revoked on the basis of the State having in place any law, regulation, or policy that defines sex based on the biological sex of an individual, as determined by the anatomy or genetics of the individual at the time of birth.
In this Act, the term State means the following:

paragraph.text: The 50 States of the United States.
A territory or possession of the United States.
Any political subdivision, instrumentality, or authority of a State.
